item.description:
🇷🇺 President Putin calls to create more advanced Russian AI.

In the Web5 future everyone will have their own self hosted AI.

item.title: Armed police swarm student after AI mistakes bag of Doritos for a weapon - Dexerto
item.description: Armed officers swarmed a 16-year-old student outside a Baltimore high school when an AI gun detection system flagged Doritos as a firearm.

item.title: The Strangest Fallout from the AWS Outage: Smart Mattresses Go Rogue and Ruin Sleep Worldwide
item.description: Smart tech promises utopia, but without robust offline fallbacks, it's just expensive fragility.

item.title: Free the Internet: The Tor Project’s annual fundraiser | Tor Project
item.description: This year we are calling to FREE THE INTERNET. Your donation will help break the chains of censorship and surveillance. If you give now during the campaign, your donation will be matched by our supporters at Power Up Privacy. This means a $25 donation will have a $50 impact.

item.title: BEE EVOLVED: 🟠 The Blockstream Satellite network beams the Bitcoin blockchain to every corner of th
item.description:
BEE EVOLVED: 🟠 The Blockstream Satellite network beams the Bitcoin blockchain to every corner of the globe, 24/7, free and immune to local outages. It brings Bitcoin to regions without reliable internet and creates a truly sovereign pathway for syncing blocks anywhere on Earth.
This side-quest project is a Bitcoin Satellite Command Console to interface with the Blockstream satellites. Every asset we develop for this project, from engineered parts to software, will be 100% free and open source, available on our GitHub 🛰
